abstract.text: Returns a new query that matches elements that contain a descendant of the requested type and an identifying property that matches a provided identifier.

inlineContent.text: The contained element type to match.
An optional string to match against the contained element’s identifying properties:

A new query that defines a search that extends the search criteria of the receiver. The new search finds elements that match the original search that contain elements of the requested type that have an identifying property that matches a provided identifier. For the list of the types, see

abstract.text: Create and run unit tests, performance tests, and UI tests for your Xcode project.
A UI element in an application.
The types of UI element that you find, inspect, and interact with in a UI test.
The element’s accessibility identifier.
The label attribute of the element.
The value that is displayed when the element has no value.
The title attribute of the element.
The raw value attribute of the element.
An object that defines the search criteria a test uses to identify UI elements.
Returns a new query that matches all direct children of the requested type.
Returns a new query that matches elements that contain a descendant that meets the logical conditions of the provided predicate.
Returns a new query that matches elements that contain a descendant of the requested type and an identifying property that matches a provided identifier.
Returns a new query that matches all descendants of the requested type.
Returns a new query that matches elements that meet the logical conditions of the provided predicate.
Returns a new query that matches elements of the requested type and have an identifying property that matches a provided identifier.
Returns a new query that matches elements that have an identifying property that matches a provided identifier.
A static, plain-text Unicode string object which you use when you need reference semantics or other Foundation-specific behavior.
A Unicode string value that is a collection of characters.
A singleton actor whose executor is equivalent to the main dispatch queue.

value.text: A static, plain-text Unicode string object.
